# Cache Storages

GraphQL Mesh can apply caching in various strategies:

| Strategy              | Docs                            |
| --------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| File Cache            | [docs](/docs/cache/file)        |
| LocalForage           | [docs](/docs/cache/localforage) |
| CloudFlare Workers KV | [docs](/docs/cache/cfwkv)       |
| Redis Cache           | [docs](/docs/cache/redis)       |
